job.title: Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: <strong><u>Overview<br><br></u></strong>Come join the "<strong>IIS Infrastructure Security Team</strong>" as a "<strong>Software Engineer 2</strong>". The Software Engineer 2 role is to employ a set of tools, automation activities and processes to ensure that sensitive data is not lost, misused, or accessed by unauthorized users.<br><br><strong><u>What You'll Bring<br></u></strong><ul><li>BS/MS in computer science or equivalent work experience. </li><li>Experience in security controls (Data Loss Prevention, Cloud Access Security Broker, URL filtering)</li><li>2+ years experience developing web, software, or mobile applications.</li><li>Solid grasp of software engineering fundamentals and their practical application.</li><li>Experience with the following: LanDesk, JAMF, Python, Github, Ansible &amp; Cloud Formation templates</li><li>Experience with the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC).</li><li>1+ years experience with web services (consuming or creating) with REST or SOAP.</li><li>Strong experience with any of the following: Python, Java/J2EE, AWS CloudFormation or Ansible.</li><li>Strong desire to learn and grow.</li><li>Excellent problem solving skills with a history of superb delivery against assigned tasks.</li><li>Solid communication skills: Demonstrated ability to explain complex technical issues to both technical and non-technical audiences.<br></li></ul>Outstanding partnership skills.<br><br><strong><u>How You Will Lead<br></u></strong><ul><li>Architecting, developing, deploying and automating SaaS and agent based security solutions</li><li>Evaluating vendor security solutions and conducting proof of concepts (POC’s)</li><li>Roughly 40% hands-on coding</li><li>Contribute to early quality activities, including peer reviews of estimates, designs and code</li><li>Resolve defects/bugs during QA testing, pre-production, production, and post-release patches</li><li>Partner effectively with all team members to deliver against commitments</li><li>Work cross-functionally with various Intuit teams: product management, program management, dev-operations, various product lines, or business units to drive forward results</li><li>Partner effectively with our security vendors, driving issue resolution and roadmap capabilities</li><li>Commitment to team success and positive team dynamics</li><li>Passion for growing and applying technical skills in service to customers</li><li>Experience with Agile Development, SCRUM, and/or Extreme Programming methodologies</li></ul>
